text:
Tomcat 3.2.1 (standalone) does not seem recognize URLs containing encoded 
spaces, such as:

http://host/webapp/filename+with+spaces.txt
http://host/webapp/filename%20with%20spaces.txt

In fact, even when using the built-in file/directory browser, Tomcat generates 
broken links to any filenames contining spaces. There does not seem to be any 
string that can get Tomcat to load these files.
creator: sjones@rational.com
